heading: Whistleblower Corner
subtext: Securely share documents, leads, and evidence that serve the public interest.
disclaimer: Do not upload classified material, trade secrets, or anything that endangers lives. Remove metadata before sharing. You are responsible for complying with applicable laws.

guidelines.text: Strip metadata (EXIF) from images/videos before sending.
Share only what you can legally disclose; avoid sensitive personal data.
Prefer open Wi-Fi + VPN when submitting sensitive tips.
If possible, compress and password-protect files; share the password separately.

examples.title: Procurement Irregularities
examples.blurb: Bids, internal mails, tender documents, or invoices that show conflicts of interest.

examples.title: Environmental Violations
examples.blurb: Photos/videos with dates and locations indicating pollution or illegal dumping.

examples.title: Public Service Failures
examples.blurb: RTI replies, grievance numbers, or memos documenting systemic issues.
